properties.Name: LegalActionType
properties.Description:
A categorization of legal action types based on common characteristics or objectives.

Ex:
- Debt collection
- Civil Procedure
- Employment Action
- Personal Injury Suit
- Lien
- Class Action Suit
- Bankruptcy

Columns.Name: LegalActionTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Legal Action Type.

Columns.Name: LegalActionTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Legal Action Type.

Columns.Name: LegalActionTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Legal Action Type.
